name: Contactive
overview:
Contactive unites the functionality of your address book with the knowledge of the Internet. It collects information from your social media networks, publicly available sources, and Contactive’s Global Directory to show who’s calling before you even answer the call.

Contactive is based out of SoHo, New York City and is a sister team to its next door neighbor Pixable, both subsidiaries of SingTel’s Digital L!fe Group. We are lucky to live the dream of every tech company - having the resources and support of an international corporation while functioning as a lean startup.

We are a small team of a big brains. We’ve got well-dressed PhDs, charmingly dangerous engineers, marketing royalty, handsome designers, wizards of big data, and wicked sharp interns. Contactive is growing very quickly, and we are currently hiring extraordinary individuals who want to help build the future of mobile communications on a global scale.
